overview: Bilal is picked up from school by his father, who is a taxi driver. But before they have time to drive, an unpleasant man jumps into the taxi. Bilal's father says he has time off, but the man threatens him with a gun to give him a taxi ride. Bilal, who does not understand the seriousness of the situation, sits next to the man with his toy gun. The man and Bilal begin a dangerous game with firearms, and it develops into a tense situation
title: Pistol
